title: Ticket #5044: Output of failed nodes was accidentally removed for some cases
description:
When working on #5039, I noticed that DAGMan no longer always outputs the failed nodes list at the end of a failed run. (I think maybe this happened when the final node feature was added.)

Anyhow, I fixed the code, but the fix still needs to be documented, and at least some of the DAGMan tests should probably check for this in the dagman.out file.
